casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. NYAMUSEVYA
v.
SCHNEIDER 2018-1559 Supreme Court of Ohio. January 23, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, Donnelly, and Stewart, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus and Prohibition. On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. Relator's motions to provide and to stay final appealable default judgment, to hold in abeyance respondent's motion to dismiss, and to remove motion to hold in abeyance respondent's motion to dismiss, and request for alternative writ denied as moot.
